#labels Featured
*WebBrowser* is a phpQuery plugin that mimics behaviors of web browser. Thanks to that developer can simulate user's behavior inside a script.

Supported are:
 * Cookies
 * Relative links
 * document.location

Some use cases are:
 * Fill forms and submit them easly
 * Login to secure pages and collect content
 * Write test cases reproducing browsing proccess

Example - querying Google:
{{{
phpQuery::$plugins->browserGet('http://google.com/', 'success1');
function success1($browser) {
$browser
  ->WebBrowser('success2')
  ->find('input[name=q]')
    ->val('phpQuery')
    ->parents('form')
      ->submit();
}
function success2($html) {
  print $html;
}
}}}
